title: Round 1 Check-In: Where Do Teams Stand? Plus, Player-Fan Interaction | Heat Check
description:
With the first round of the NBA playoffs in full effect, Joe House calls in to check on where the current Eastern and Western Conference matchups stand (02:51), including 76ers - Nets (18:03) and Clippers - Warriors (28:59). Then Tyler Tynes discusses his recent piece on the touchy relationship between NBA players and fans (50:14).

Read Tyler Tynes's piece on fan abuse towards players here.

Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Joe House, Tyler Tynes

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
